summary: This is a service request record from SigNet Technologies/Converging Federal Solutions for the Federal Bureau of Prisons at MCC New York. The request, created on February 28, 2019, concerns a RAID array that needs to be rebuilt, with Jeffrey McKenzie identified as the senior customer support technician handling the issue.

persons.name: Jeffrey McKenzie
persons.context: Jeffrey McKenzie is listed as the Senior Customer Support Technician for SigNet Technologies/Converging Federal Solutions, the company handling the service request for the Federal Bureau of Prisons.

events.title: Service Request Created for RAID Rebuild
events.description: A service request (#22855) is created for the Federal Bureau of Prisons at MCC New York to rebuild a RAID array from the front LCD.

locations: 123O0 n CI Suite E, Beltsvile, MD 20705
keyFacts: The document is a technical service request for the Federal Bureau of Prisons at MCC New York, dated February 28, 2019.
The request concerns rebuilding a RAID array, with serial number 43144901, from the front LCD.
Jeffrey McKenzie of SigNet Technologies/Converging Federal Solutions is the assigned senior customer support technician.
The service location is the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York at 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007.
The document appears to be a routine IT support ticket and contains no direct references to Jeffrey Epstein, victims, or criminal activities.
